system.prerequisites:
Chorus of the Righteous
OW: Psy Rating 5
system.sustained: The Psyker chooses a number of allies, up to their Psy Rating (excluding themselves). As long as power is sustained, each ally gains +5, with additional +5 per Degree of Success on Focus power Test, to their Intelligence and Perception characteristics, up to a maximum of +30. The Psyker shares their faith with their allies, bolstering their minds.
